name: io.bytes.per.checksum
explanation: This configuration is missing a value. It is responsible for the number of bytes per checksum, which is crucial for data integrity. The missing value could cause errors in data processing tasks.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.retry.max.attempts
explanation: This configuration is related to the maximum number of retries to satisfy the block storage policy. If the task is failing due to issues with block storage, this configuration could be the root cause.

name: dfs.namenode.available-space-rack-fault-tolerant-block-placement-policy.balanced-space-tolerance
explanation: This configuration is related to the block placement policy. If the task is failing due to issues with block placement, this configuration could be the root cause.
